kariminf.ktoolja.plugins

Class JarLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • kariminf.ktoolja.plugins.JarLoader

  • public class JarLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for loading jar files as plugins

    • Constructor Detail

      • JarLoader

        public JarLoader(java.lang.String location,
                 java.lang.String extensionName,
                 java.lang.String extensionVersion)
        Creates a new JarLoader
        Parameters:
        location - the location where we can find the Jar Files (must end with "/")
        extensionName - to compare it with "Extension-Name" in META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file of the Jar
        extensionVersion - to compare it with "Specification-Version" in META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file of the Jar

    • Method Detail

      • getInfoService

        public <T extends Info> T getInfoService(java.lang.String indicator,
                                         java.lang.Class<T> infoClass)
        Gets an instance of the class that implements Info in the Jar, given a language
        Parameters:
        indicator - it is used as a mean to detect if the info class is what we are looking for
        infoClass - the class that extends Info
        Returns:
        an instance of "infoClass" specific for the language needed

      • getClassService

        public <T> T getClassService(Info info,
                             java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        Gets an instance of the class that implements a service (or a class cls)
        Parameters:
        info - the info file where we want to get the service
        cls - the class representing the service we looking for
        Returns:
        an instance of the class that implements a service cls

      • getServiceByName

        private <T> T getServiceByName(java.lang.String className,
                               java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        Gets an instance of the class that implements a service (or a class cls) by its name
        Parameters:
        className - the class name
        cls - the class which we are looking for its service
        Returns:
        an instance of the class cls

      • FindService

        private <T> T FindService(java.lang.String packageName,
                          java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        Searches for an instance of the class that implements a service (or a class cls). This is used when we fail to get the instance using the name
        Parameters:
        packageName - the name of the jar file
        cls - the class which we are looking for its service
        Returns:
        an instance of the class cls

      • loadJars

        private java.net.URLClassLoader loadJars(java.lang.String location)
        Loads all jar files that have the wanted extension's name and version.
        Parameters:
        location - the folder where we search for jars
        Returns:
        a class loader
